summary: Provides a configurable control network for diffusion models, comprising a UNet‑style backbone with residual blocks, attention and spatial transformer layers, and optional class conditioning. It also includes a dedicated module that converts auxiliary conditioning data (e.g., edge maps, depth maps) into latent embeddings for integration, plus a minimal zero‑output utility that is currently unused. The components together enable the injection of spatial control signals into generative diffusion pipelines.
business_intent: Offer developers a plug‑and‑play solution to add precise, user‑driven conditioning to text‑to‑image diffusion systems, facilitating controllable image synthesis for creative, design, and visual‑effects applications.
